titles.title: A resolution to express the sense of the Senate with respect to the appropriation of funds for the Public Health Emergency Fund and for the provision of medical treatment for veterans with acquired immune deficiency syndrome.

action.text: Referred to the Committee on Appropriations.

bill.summary: 6/16/1987--Introduced. Expresses the sense of the Senate that the Congress should appropriate, for FY 1988: (1) sufficient funds to establish and maintain the Public Health Emergency Fund authorized under current law; and (2) a specified amount to the Veterans Administration for medical care for persons havings AIDS (acquired immune deficiency syndrome) who are entitled to receive medical care under laws administered by the Veterans Administration.
